name: Mauli Multipurpose charitable society

address: Care of Mauli Hospital,80, Budhwar Peth,Opp. Prabhat Talkies,KARAD

briefDescription: Mauli Multipurpose charitable society (MMCS) is established in 2005,  MMCS is a Non Political, Non Sectarian, and Voluntary Social Welfare Organization. Our main goal is to establish in underserved areas a facility that can serve as a Centre for Healthcare administration to the people in the community and as a base for our health education programs, that serve to improve basic knowledge about the normal functioning body and about common diseases endemic in that population.

address: C/O Mauli Hospital,80, Budhwar Peth,Opp. Prabhat Talkies,KARAD
